fields.request: Manual QA: Validate public charger usage timeline colors
fields.request_details:
Identify a public charger with recent status activity and log in with access to its advanced status view.
- Navigate to the charger status page at /ocpp/c/<charger-id>/status/.
- Confirm the usage timeline legend renders Offline with a black swatch, Available with a dark blue swatch, and Charging with a green swatch.
- Inspect the usage timeline bars and ensure each segment color matches the legend entry for its status.
- Trigger or wait for at least one update to verify the colors remain visible after the page refreshes.
